section.name: Roadmap
section.p: Interested in getting involved? Looking for a place to start? This document is inteded to assist you in figuring out what to do.

subsection.name: Where We're Headed
subsection.p: Having recently graduated from the incubator, the first goal of our community is the release a binary version of the Pluto Container. This binary release will be based upon the initial Pluto contribution which was donated by IBM.

Several people have suggested a revolutionary approach to Pluto's implementation. The suggestion centers around the complexity of the current implementation and a desire to make Pluto more "container like". Pluto 1.1, a second generation implementation, is an attempt to do just that. See the Pluto 1.1 section of the online documentation for more details.

ul.li: Add more Documentation, especially for the 1.1 branch
Enable user-specific Portlet Preferences as required by the spec
Add user registration to the admin portlet app to support the previous two items
Support custom portlet modes and window states.
Enhance admin portlets to support runtime changes in portlet app layout
Support themes or skins for the Portal
